scripts.build:ui: rmdir /s /q build && cd D:/fullstack/fullstackopen/part2/coursecontents && npm run build && xcopy "D:\fullstack\fullstackopen\part2\coursecontents\build" "D:\fullstack\fullstackopen\part3\courseinfo\build" /E /I
scripts.deploy:full: npm run build:ui && git add . && git commit -m uibuild && git push
